reviews.review: Too Boring and too Simple...Worst Avengers
The 10 year investment was worth it, this franchise is amazing and this was a perfect addition to the MCU
I saw Infinity War for the second time and I liked even more the second time. Great movie and would recommend it to anyone... especially comic book movie goers and those who enjoy action
What an AWESOME Marvel ride! Not to be missed!!
I really enjoyed how they focused on Thanos's arc, a shame they did not weave in Death, but I had a great time with this one.
Amazing, its surprise behind surprise. The best in thi genre.

For fans this is a great must see show...but for cinema and story telling not great at all. Everyone except the original avengers are gone??? Okay...we all know that with the infinity gauntlet they are able to bring people back to life so why waste this emotional funeral scenes for this??? Also if they bring everyone back what about quicksilver??? Can he come back too?! If not poor him!!! Anyways this film is amazing if you’re a fan of seeing some of these comic book icons on screen. But story wise they really need a better job. Don’t get me wrong this movie is was better organized and way better put that justice league...buuuuut the cgi did lack and was surprising to me since it is a high caliber movie. Other than that I love the guardians sad to see them go except for rocket the “rat” and I’m just waiting for the next part now. I’m not paying for Ant-Man unless it has something to do with this one cuz he wasn’t in this neither was Hawkeye. Oh and spoiler alert for those who are almost at the end of this rant. Overall okay movie
Had some good funny parts, but tried to cram too many fights/wars into the movie. Not a good ending.

Best Marvel movie I have ever seen. it was comedic at the right moments, serious when it needed to be. The actors did an amazing job especially Tom Hallond which I thought he wasn't the best Spiderman until after I saw this movie. Thanos felt like the most powerful person in the universe. You need to rush in and experience this movie.
